dek: If your name is Baby, then seemingly every song is about you. But what if your name isn’t Baby?

nonPeopleText.value: Many people’s names can also be places (America, London etc.), brands (Chanel, Louis etc.), vehicles (Harley, Ford etc.), references to drugs (Molly, Mary Jane etc.) and other things that may not be related to an actual person.
Do you want to include mention of these names anyway?
